name: LN_ADJ_PMT_DT
description:
This table holds the date the other payer paid the service.





The LN_ADJ_OTH_PYR_ID, LN_ADJ_AMT_PAID, LN_ADJ_PROC_QUAL, LN_ADJ_PROC_CD, LN_ADJ_PROC_DESC, LN_ADJ_PROC_MOD, LN_ADJ_QTY, LN_ADJ_BUND_LN_NUM, LN_ADJ_PMT_DT, LN_ADJ_REV_CD, LN_ADJ_PAT_DUE, and LN_ADJ_OTH_PYR_SEQ_CD tables are related to one another. The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim values record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_ADJ_PMT_DT
columns.description: This item holds the date the other payer paid.
